blockers.description: Subscription SKU changes don't update upcoming deliveries due to customer recurring selection behavior
blockers.owner: Product teams (GoodChop and The Pets Table)
blockers.impact: Customers changing plan size (e.g., 6 cuts to 8 cuts) see incorrect number of items in upcoming deliveries until they manually reselect meals

blockers.description: Select Cuts page performance on GoodChop first-box flow taking 600-700ms instead of target 300-500ms
blockers.impact: Slower customer experience during pre-checkout cut selection, likely related to new product cards rollout

action_items.task: Investigate optimization for Select Cuts page performance on GoodChop first-box flow
Connect U027201FQSV with VMS team (U08E2S3V5D1, U09D8BZ9891) to support OTP work
Submit questions for Mega Alliances AMA via Slido
Sign up for L2 New Ventures on-call rotation
Fill out form for New Ventures merch

key_context.summary: Both GoodChop and The Pets Table have an issue where changing subscription plan size doesn't update upcoming deliveries due to how customer recurring selection works. This is expected system behavior, not a bug, and requires product/UX changes to fix properly.
key_context.relevance: Affects customer experience when changing plans and requires cross-team coordination between product and engineering to resolve

key_context.summary: Multiple team changes including Prateek joining as Staff PM for The Pets Table, Troy joining as intern for AI initiatives, promotions for U03TY4YJU4X and UEZ4PRFKM, Shujath Khan leaving after 3.5 years, and U02KQF884CT joining the tribe.
key_context.relevance: Significant team composition changes affecting project ownership and team dynamics

key_context.summary: GoodChop team investigating why Select Cuts page performance degraded from 300-500ms to 600-700ms, likely due to new product cards rollout. Need to find optimization solutions without rolling back the feature.
key_context.relevance: Impacts customer conversion and experience during critical pre-checkout flow

key_context.summary: L2 New Ventures on-call will combine with another rotation in Q4 to support all TAM-owned backend services, making incident response more streamlined.
key_context.relevance: Changes operational support model and improves incident response capabilities

key_context.summary: Company implementing 'Mega Alliances' and Ways of Working changes. Team having AMA to discuss specific impacts on New Ventures tribe.
key_context.relevance: Structural organizational changes that will affect how the tribe operates and collaborates

summary: New Ventures tribe messages covering team changes (new hires, promotions, departures), technical issues with subscription SKU updates affecting GoodChop and The Pets Table, performance optimization work, and organizational changes around on-call rotations and Mega Alliances structure.
